channel.title: Weed Class B
channel.description: so wth is this all about. New changes in UK drug law have made cannabis a class B. Not just skunk, the entire drug. I think this is completely illogical on behalf on the government. what are the implications going to be? will weed get more expensive, or harder to get hold of? ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS

actually, they could arrest you, they just could not, too

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @A_Legend A Legend
item.description:
@A_Legend wrote:

At one time they was thinking about putting it legal but taxing it, now it’s class b they’ve only done it so they can arrest you on the spot even if it’s a small amount as before you could have a personal amount on you which they could only take it off you and not arrest you.

Read full topic

Where I live, if you added weight to your hash for selling, you would probably get your ass kicked very hard and no one would buy from you ever again. Bad hash doesn’t exist here.

No, they just stick it in the MDMA instead

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

the hash commonly found in the Uk is fucking sick. weighed up with just about anything (rubber from car tyres, shit). Really hard to get some good hash, but recently found some good pollen. not a big fan of hash anyway. I’d love to try some real hash, however.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @pesky pesky
item.description:
@pesky wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:32, topic:258613”][quote author=jme link=topic=341504.msg2683118#msg2683118 date=1235508818]

hash is not cleaner, its made fromt he scraps and resin n shit, my sister a dealer and shes put horse tranqulizers in with it before, its deffo not cleaner

lol thankyou! =D as i dunno where any of you are from and have never had your hash i wouldnt know would i lol

Haha. No sorry you’re just ignorant. Hash is made from the trichomes of the plant. There is fewer plant material, and more thc. It’s a cleaner more potent smoke.

Show me a reliable source backing up your claims.

[/quote]

Actually, in the UK, 90% of hash is much much dirtier, and hes right, some really unsavoury shit is mixed in there.

http://www.ukcia.org/activism/soapbar.htm

Yes this shit shouldn’t even be called hash, but thats what everyone except the really knowledgable sad drug geeks like us call it, so i dunno if you could be called ignorant for staying away from it :p[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

No it’s not a proven fact. As for hash, that’s bullshit too. That’s a new one, I laughed at it. Hash is healthier to smoke, it’s cleaner and more potent so you smoke much less.

http://www.erowid.org/plants/cannabis/cannabis_health3.shtml
All information is cited with reliable sources.

Show me your sources

Read full topic

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @pesky pesky
item.description:
@pesky wrote:

its a proven fact that it can make u go fucked in the head, especially if its hash not weed, i also know people who have smoked all there lifes and some, not all, just liek not all smokers have lung cancer, are ‘‘slow’’ and one has all sorts of issues
It doesnt matter what your job is it can hit you at anytime, like my freind knew a 80 year old who smoked 20 a day sine she was 14 and she died of natural courses… its the same basic princaple

Read full topic

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

pesky:

2) weed = after a long period of time u go paranoid and scitzo, possibly wanting to harm others not just yourself

That’s bullshit, sorry. It’s possible, if you have a pre-existing mental disorder it could get worse.

I know teachers, lawyers, police officers, successful real-estate agents, etc that have been smoking weed since they were kids. All of them are at least 45-60 years old. They have nothing wrong with them.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @pesky pesky
item.description:
@pesky wrote:

i like a bit of weed everynow and then, but

  1. normal backy = after a long period of time u get cancer
  2. weed = after a long period of time u go paranoid and scitzo, possibly wanting to harm others not just yourself

Also some people smoke weed because it is illegal, if they made it legal people would be after harder drugs to make them look ‘cool’…

I personally think it should be avalible easier… but they should have a way of making you only have like 1 joint a day or something… That however is imposible, also like i said before people would just go onto harder drugs…

Read full topic

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:19, topic:258613”][quote author=Greg the Xeno link=topic=341504.msg2654569#msg2654569 date=1233772352]

so wth is this all about. New changes in UK drug law have made cannabis a class B. Not just skunk, the entire drug. I think this is completely illogical on behalf on the government. what are the implications going to be? will weed get more expensive, or harder to get hold of?
ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS

lol thats hilarious, but really its for the better of the people if you think about it.

If cannabis was legalized, and supply keeps up with demand, hundreds, even thousands of local businesses could survive the recessional, and millions could be made from the tax.

But no, since smoking is bad, cannabis is obviously worse.

Cannabis is worse. When people come down from their high’s they go crazy, my friend would sit in his room all day feeling like ####. having “nicfits” is less dramatic.
[/quote]

What? All it does it make you feel a little more relaxed and sleepy. Far from shitty though.

I think you guys need to get some better weed.[/quote]

Definitely, but I don’t like smoking and feel like shit after smoking anyway. I’ve had a few good trips though.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed Class B
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Anyone in UK watch Horizon: Cannabis: The evil weed?

Really interesting watch, and completely fair towards both sides of the debate. One guy really summed up how you feel when you get stoned:
“It’s like slipping in to a warm bath at the end of the day…with ya little rubber ducky.”

Read full topic

I can’t be asked to provide any links(as it’s much easier to just wait until jme pops in this thread), but if you can’t be asked to do some proper research, take everything your friends tell you with a pinch of salt.
